task.title: Schedule an Employee
task.shortdesc: Scheduling enables managers to apply shifts to employees.

step.cmd: Select the schedule team that you want to schedule.

image.alt: Select Schedule on Team Schedule Page

step.cmd: Select Create Schedule. When creating a schedule, the Team Schedule page reflects Draft in the top right corner.
Select Publish to make a schedule available for view.
step.info: To edit a schedule, the schedule must be in draft status.

step.cmd: Select a shift for an employee and a date.
On the employee detail card pop-up window, make the necessary changes and select Save.
When the shift has been edited, select Re-Publish to publish the change to the employee's schedule.
Select Export to export the team schedule and print it as a Microsoft Excel file.
